page.title: 14 Survey of Tourists.
page.content: Place-Car park,Meddins Lane near holy Austin Rock Houses. Time-2:30 to 4:00 Sunday 30th June 1985. Weather-dull,cloudy,sudden showers. Temperature-19c Cars:54. Where visitors lived.Furthest Sheffield 150 miles. Birmingham 28 Kinver 18 K'minster 17 W'hampton 16 Dudley 16 Worcester 10 Stourbridge 9 Bilston 8 Warley 7 Oldbury 6 Redditch5 West Brom' 4 Wednesfield 4 B'north 3 Halesowen 2 Wednesbury 2 Telford 2 Sheffield 2 Cannock 2 Walsall 2 Stourport 2 Upper Sapey 2 Alveley 1 Frequency of visiting Kinver Edge. 94 people frequently 7 people 6-10 times 37 people 1-5 times 6 people 1st time.
